content: भ्रामर {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (री|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [भ्रमरेण संभृतं भ्रमरस्येदं वा अण्] Relating to a bee. --रः --रं A kind of loadstone. --रं {@--1@} Whirling round. {@--2@} Giddiness. {@--3@} Epilepsy. {@--4@} Honey. {@--5@} A kind of coitus or mode of sexual enjoyment. {@--6@} A village. --री {@--1@} An epithet of Durgā. {@--2@} Going round, walking round from left to right; (= प्रदक्षिणा <ab>q. v.</ab>); as in दीयंतां भ्रामर्यः <ls>Karpūr. 4</ls>, <ls>Vb. 2.</ls>
